title: Anyone else having bluetooth connection issues on a 4a?
content:
I upgraded from a pixel 2 to a pixel 4a whenever it came out, and since day 1 I have had nothing but problems with bluetooth connections. While in my car or using bluetooth headsets, any sort of notification (email, text, snapchat) or unlocking/locking the phone will drop all bluetooth connections. 

I talked to support a few times and completed all steps with no avail. Anyone else have issues like this?
